bookSection.title: About the Book
bookSection.description: With playful rhymes and hand-drawn illustrations, this bedtime story is for anyone who loves socks or likes spending time with a big yellow monster. Creator Andy Hay imagines a whimsical world filled with magic, color, and delight.

behindTheScenes.title: Behind the Scenes
behindTheScenes.description: From the magical sock trees to the basement full of sardine tins, every detail in Earl's world was carefully crafted to create a delightful reading experience. The story combines whimsical elements with practical sock care tips, making it both entertaining and educational.
